participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and determined, often looking for new challenges and ways to express myself.
participant_1.background: I tore my ACL while racing go carts and couldn't race for the rest of the season. I spend my days working on custom upholstery projects, coming up with new designs for my clothes, and playing board games with friends. I love that I get to be around my pets all day. I sell real estate and wait tables on the weekends. I do not have children.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and resilient, I face challenges with a positive attitude and cherish my family.
participant_2.background: I am not very coordinated, and I often trip over my own feet. I like to drink at bars with friends. I love my music and playing guitar is my favorite way to relax after a long day. I'm a stay-at-home mom who is trying to raise my children as best I can despite my health problems. I type one handed.

content.text: Hey how is your evening going?
It's going well! Just got home from a long day at work.
Oh yeah, what do you do for work?
I'm a stay-at-home mom, it's a lot of work but it's also very rewarding.
That's awesome! I'm sure your kids are really lucky to have you.
Aw thank you, I love being a mom!
I have a 4 year old daughter and a 2 year old son.
Aww how cute, I bet they keep you busy!
They definitely do! But I wouldn't have it any other way.
Well I'm glad to hear you're happy with your life. I'm just a bartender at the moment, but I'm trying to get my real estate license.
Oh that's cool, I know a few people in real estate. It's a lot of work but it can be really rewarding.
Yeah, that's what I've heard. I'm just trying to find something that I'm passionate about.
I think you'll be great at it! You just have to find the right fit
